mapper.insert: insert into members (id, pw, name, nick, phone, email) values (#{id}, PASSWORD(#{pw}), #{name}, #{nick}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.select: select * from members where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, email=#{email} where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.delete: delete from members where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.select: select * from members order by regdate
